title: server: can not pass etcd local test with send/receive corruption enabled
body:
I use etcd [local-test](https://github.com/coreos/etcd/tree/master/tools/local-tester) and find that the bank transfer test will fail when enable send/receive corruption flag. 

When these flags enabled, local-test will randomly change a byte in the data, but now we have no way to check it.

Maybe we should wait gRPC, but seem that we still need checksum? /cc @xiang90
